short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play cowboy Games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!

short.et: Mängige kohe kauboimängu. Avastage selle mängu mängimise rõõm – teie ülim õnnelik veebikogemus! Proovi seda kohe!
short.ja: 今すぐカウボーイ ゲームをプレイしてください。このゲームでプレイする喜びを発見してください - 究極のオンライン ハッピー エクスペリエンス!やってみよう！
short.ko: 지금 바로 카우보이 게임을 즐겨보세요. 이 게임의 즐거움을 발견해보세요 - 최고의 온라인 행복한 경험을 즐겨보세요! 지금 사용해 보세요!
short.nl: Speel nu cowboyspel. Ontdek het plezier van het spelen van dit spel: jouw ultieme online gelukkige ervaring! Probeer het nu!
short.tr: Hemen kovboy oyununu oyna. Bu oyunu oynamanın keyfini keşfedin - Nihai Çevrimiçi Mutlu Deneyiminiz! Şimdi dene!
short.vi: Chơi game cao bồi ngay bây giờ. Khám phá niềm vui khi chơi trò chơi này - Trải nghiệm hạnh phúc trực tuyến đỉnh cao của bạn! Thử…
short.zh_CN: 立即玩牛仔游戏。发现玩这个游戏的乐趣 - 您终极的在线快乐体验！现在就试试！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play cowboy Games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!

How to install this extension?
On the extension's details page, locate the "Add to Chrome" button. Click on it to start the installation process.

A pop-up window will appear, displaying the permissions required by the extension. Read through the permissions to make sure you're comfortable with the access the extension requests. If you're satisfied, click on the "Add extension" button.

Chrome will begin downloading and installing the extension. You can monitor the progress in the small dialog box that appears on the top-right corner of the browser window.

Once the installation is complete, you'll see a notification confirming that the extension has been added to Chrome. You may also see a new icon for the extension near the address bar or in the Chrome toolbar.

Then Start your game!
